paper.title: Optimization of Agricultural Land Use on the Basis of Mathematical Methods of Financial Analysis and the Theory of Fuzzy Sets
paper.abstract: The article presents the optimization model of unsustainable land use on the basis of data on crop acreage and yield for major agricultural crops grown in the Rostov region. The following mathematical apparatus used for modeling: methods of regression analysis and nonlinear optimization, commonly used in the mathematical methods of financial analysis to optimize portfolios of financial instruments. The model allows to calculate the optimal quantitative distribution of territories that ensures the maximum average yield with minimal average risk. Model modified on the basis of fuzzy set theory to apply in practical calculations, the overall estimated harvest of crop species.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要研究农业土地利用的优化模型，虽然使用了金融分析中的数学方法（如回归分析和非线性优化），但其核心应用场景是农业产量和风险的优化，而非金融领域。论文未提及衍生品定价、金融风险管理或投资组合管理的具体应用。
